attributes.name: Wilderness Ward IV
attributes.parsed_description: 1.88% Physical and 0.63% Elemental Damage Absorption.
1.88% Physical and 0.63% Elemental Damage Absorption.

attributes.name: Refreshing Evasion
attributes.parsed_description: Reduces active cooldowns by -0.5% after exiting the dodge animation.
Reduces active cooldowns by -1.0% after exiting the dodge animation.

attributes.name: of the Soldier
attributes.parsed_description: 20 &mdash 25 Strength
20 - 25 Strength

attributes.name: Hearty
attributes.parsed_description: You have 5.0% Max stamina.
You have 9.5% Max stamina.

attributes.name: Leeching
attributes.parsed_description: You gain 0.5% of your damage as health. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
You gain 1.4% of your damage as health. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
